name: Dan Benjamin
bio: Dan is a broadcaster, writer, software developer, designer, and ex-corporate stooge. He is the founder of 5by5, a podcast network where he hosts a handful of shows including Quit, Podcast Method, Back to Work with Merlin Mann, and Road Work with John Roderick. He is the author of Bacon Method and Hivelogic, and has written for A List Apart and Oâ€™Reilly.
